The first deployment does not consume DP, deploys a Shadow Whistle and retreats, and immediately resets the Redeployment Time
After deployment, ATK +60%, immediately recalls the Shadow Whistle to deal 80% ATK as Physical damage to up to 4 enemies in its path, and obtains 1 DP every time this unit damages an enemy during skill duration

elite_levels.description: After dealing damage to each enemy for the first time, Binds the target for 3 seconds and Steals 50 ATK from them (lasts until the target is defeated or Ines leaves the field)
After dealing damage to each enemy for the first time, Binds the target for 5 seconds and Steals 90 ATK from them (lasts until the target is defeated or Ines leaves the field)

potential_upgrades.description: After dealing damage to each enemy for the first time, Binds the target for 3 seconds and Steals 60 (+10) ATK from them (lasts until the target is defeated or Ines leaves the field)
After dealing damage to each enemy for the first time, Binds the target for 5 seconds and Steals 100 (+10) ATK from them (lasts until the target is defeated or Ines leaves the field)

elite_levels.description: Reveals Invisible enemies within Attack Range and their Movement Speed -30%. After being retreated, leaves a Shadow Whistle to maintain the effect (max 1)
